thread.title: Watch: A look at upgrades coming to Sanford Stadium
thread.title_full: Watch: A look at upgrades coming to Sanford Stadium

title: Watch: A look at upgrades coming to Sanford Stadium
text:
Manage Watch: A look at upgrades coming to Sanford Stadium Dawgs247 offers up a look at the new enhancements and upgrades coming to Sanford Stadium in the fall of 2018. Slot to Georgia Links 
Georgia's athletic board approved $63 million for enhancements to Sanford Stadium on Tuesday. Those upgrades will include a new home locker room and recruiting lounge in the west end zone as well as new concession areas and bathrooms on that end of the stadium. Not a member? For a limited time, buy one month of Dawgs247 VIP, get two months FREE! 
Construction will begin after May's graduation commencement and it is expected to be finished within 17 months of the start date. 
A new scoreboard will also be installed as well as a plaza area behind it that connects the stadium to the existing bridge. Board members and reporters were allowed to see a presentation outlining the upcoming improvements and video of that presentation can be seen up top. Author
